(GOOGLE REVIEW) "I just went recently and had the chicken tikka masala. I honestly teared up from how much I missed that flavor." چکن تکہ مصالح - Suranne Douglas - GOOGLE REVIEW کھانا پینا The Menu "This place is, without a doubt, the best Pakistani/Indian cuisine in greater Charleston." Order Online MOUNT PLEASANT RESERVE A TABLE Chicken Biryani چکن بریانی Chapli Kabab چپلی کباب Zahaib Quadri - GOOGLE REVIEW THE BEST PAKISTANI RESTAURANT I have seen so far in the US. Truly Authentic Pakistani food, reminded me of the original chicken biryani which I used to eat in Karachi, Pakistan. #overheard #shhhhh "O.M.G. This Chaat Papri is like a party in my mouth. I'm in love." Chaat Papri چاٹ پاپڑی Thoughtfully Paired:Craft Beer + Curated Wine "Malika is Now One of the Only Pakistani Restaurants in the Country to Offer Alcohol" We offer local and international craft beers and ciders that pair beautifully with our rich and spicy flavors.Current selection includes favorites from Munkle, Westbrook, Coast, Wölffer, Stiegl along with a fine selection of white, red and rosé. م Maryam About The force behind the kitchen of Charleston’s beloved former Ma’am Saab pop up at Workshop, and now first-ever Pakistani restaurant to grace the state, Malika, Maryam, along with her husband, Co-Owner and Creative Director Raheel Gauba, are bringing a taste of Pakistan culture and cuisine to the Lowcountry.Born in Pakistan, food was the center of the Ghaznavi household as Maryam’s mother, grandmother and sister all cooked Pakistani food. Maryam as the “chief taste tester” grew such a love for her culture’s staple dishes like Biryanis, Karahis, Saags and Kababs, and through many hours spent in the kitchen, became a chef herself.Maryam and Raheel’s families both moved from Pakistan to Canada where the two met, and later relocated to the Lowcountry. The couple jumped at the opportunity to do a Pakistani popup at The Daily in 2019, capturing the hearts and stomachs of locals and visitors alike, before opening Ma’am Saab at Workshop the following year in 2020. Fast forward to today, and the power couple now has plans to open a restaurant downtown on Meeting Street very soon, while continuing to operate their fast-casual Pakistani street food concept Malika in Mount Pleasant Towne Centre!Street food is an essential part of everyday life in Pakistan. Maryam's fondest memories include going out with family and friends and visiting streetside cafe's (dhabas) enjoying chaats and biryanis. Malika was created to deliver the flavors, sights and sounds that mean the world to me, but what I hope you'll walk away with are moments that you will cherish forever. Welcome to Pakistan y'all. مریم Chef & Owner @ Malika & Ma’am Saab Celebrate with malika Private events, Welcome Dinners, Sangeets, Birthdays, Corporate events & more... Catering & Events دعوت وغیرہ Host your next event with us and experience southern hospitality with a south-asian twist. Wow your guests at one of the most celebrated dining rooms in the Greater Charleston area. With an outdoor patio, we are able to accomodate parties from 10 to 100 guests.We look forward to delivering an unforgettable experience for you and your guests... one that your friends will reminisce over for years to come.Already have a venue? No problem... We cater and deliver the goods to you! Inquire with us about availability and let's get started! Catering Inquiries The Venue The color and the aroma is only the beginning. Taking from our south-asian heritage blended with a bold and adventurous vision, we can help design a menu perfect for your unique gathering. We are able to accomodate most allergies and dietary preferences. Unique catering packages available with delivery for catered lunches in Mt. Pleasant and surrounding areas. The flavors will blow your mind. We deliver! Inspired by our Pakistani & Indian Heritage Catering Inquiries Submit The Details: Type of event: Email: Phone number: Name: !غُٹرغُوں Boom! I sent it.The hoomans will be in touch soon. Press ...میڈیا As seen on: Submit Media Inquiries: Subject: Message: Name: Email: !غُٹرغُوں The deed has been done. Subject: Message: Your Name: Your Email: Submit Phone number: !غُٹرغُوں Hello beautiful!Your message is on its way... رابطہ فرمایے Contact Us 1333 Theater Drive, Mount Pleasant, SC (843) 388-5178 Mount Pleasant at Towne Centre Apply Tell us why you'd be a great fit: Name: Email: Phone number Position !غُٹرغُوں Message received.My people will be in touch. Front of House Leads & Servers, Line Cooks, Prep Cooks, Dishwashers & Managers. WE are Hiring Apply for a job at Malika Ⓒ Malika, LLC. All Rights Reserved. We do not accept cash. Cards and contactless payments welcome. You've reached the end of transmission. We conclude this webpage with a huge thanks for making it all the way down here.If you're not already ordering or making your way in, then this didn't work out as expected.
